example.eg: He lowered the box from the shelf.
example.egtrans: 他把盒子从架子上拿了下来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 放下, 拿下, 取下

example.eg: The store lowers prices for sales.
example.egtrans: 商店在降价销售。

example.eg: Please lower the volume on the radio!
example.egtrans: 把收音机的音量开小点！

dsense.name: lower
dsense.guideword: (comparative of low: less high up) (比较级，高度、所处位置)

example.eg: The shoes are on a lower shelf.
example.egtrans: 鞋子在较低的那个架子上。

dsense.name: lower
dsense.guideword: (comparative of low: further down than [sth]) (比较级)

example.eg: That fish is lower than the other in the food chain.
example.egtrans: 那种鱼在食物链中的地位比其它鱼更低。

example.eg: She comes from a lower caste in India.
example.egtrans: 她来自印度的下级阶层。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 较下级的，下层的，下等的

example.eg: The weather forecaster lowered the prediction from a storm to a gale.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 降低…的级别, 给...降级

example.eg: You should lower your expectations, based on your lack of success so far.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 减少, 减弱, 降低

dsense.name: lower your guard, UK: lower your defences, US: lower your defenses

example.eg: He lowered his guard once he realized it was a friend.
You should lower the emotional level in this piece of writing.
You can lower the pitch by making the guitar strings looser.
This room has low ceilings.
example.egtrans: 这个房间的天花板很低。

example.eg: The standard of entries in this year's competition is very low.
example.egtrans: 她的晚礼服领口开得很低。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 开得低的, 差的, 低于一般标准的

dsense.name: low
dsense.guideword: (pitch, tone: dull or deep) (音高、声调)

example.eg: Do you hear that low hum?
example.egtrans: 你听到那声低鸣了么？

example.eg: She spoke into his ear in a very low voice.
example.egtrans: 她低声向他耳语。

example.eg: Supplies of toilet paper are low.
example.egtrans: 卫生纸不多了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 少的, 不足的, 短缺的

example.eg: The shop is selling jeans at a very low price.
example.egtrans: 那家店正在低价销售牛仔裤。

example.eg: Low tactics like cheating your customers will make you a lot of enemies.
example.egtrans: 诈骗客户等卑劣的经商手段会让你四处树敌。

example.eg: The plane flew low over the houses.
example.egtrans: 飞机低低地飞过一栋栋房屋。

dsense.name: low
dsense.guideword: (down: to or in a low position)

example.eg: He bent down low to kiss his child.
example.egtrans: 他弯下腰去亲他的孩子。

example.eg: I'm feeling low today after hearing the bad news.
example.egtrans: 听到那个坏消息后，我今天情绪低落。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 情绪低沉的，情绪低落的，沮丧的

example.eg: She was from a low caste.
I have a low opinion of people like him.
I don't want you using low language like that around the children.
We put the car into low gear to climb the hill.
The sun was low and about to set.
example.egtrans: 太阳位置很低，快要下山了。

example.eg: It was early morning, and the sun was still low.
example.egtrans: 天才刚亮，太阳还低悬在空中。

example.eg: He spoke low so nobody could hear.
example.egtrans: 他低声说话，这样就没人能听到了。

example.eg: I hope you sing bass because you need to sing this song very low.
example.egtrans: 因为这首歌需要你非常低沉地演唱，所以我希望你唱低音部。

example.eg: The rule with stocks is: buy low, sell high!
example.egtrans: 炒股的规则就是：低价买入，高价抛出！

example.eg: The stock hit a record low for the year.
example.egtrans: 这支股票跌到了今年的最低点。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 低价, 低点, 低水平

example.eg: There is a low centred over the Atlantic, causing storms.
example.egtrans: 大西洋上空有一个低气压中心，会引起风暴。

example.eg: The cow's low was a mournful sound in the middle of the night.
example.egtrans: 夜半时分，母牛哞哞的叫声听起来十分悲凉。

example.eg: The cattle were lowing.
example.egtrans: 牛群在哞哞叫。

example.eg: If you have a persistent pain in your lower abdomen you should see a doctor.
My chair's shaped so that my lower back is well-supported.

dsense.name: lower back pain
dsense.guideword: (discomfort in lowest part of the back)

example.eg: Poor posture can result in lower back pain.
His lower body was badly injured by the landmine, but he survived.
The government is concentrating on social issues because it is desperate to win the vote of the lower classes at the next election.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 下层阶级, 社会下层

dsense.name: lower deck
dsense.guideword: (second from bottom in larger ship) (指较大船只的底部倒数第二层甲板)

example.eg: Some universities are lower in status than others.

dsense.name: lower intermediate, lower-intermediate
dsense.guideword: (level, degree: medium to low) (水平、等级、级别)

dsense.name: lower ranks
dsense.guideword: (those with lesser status in a hierarchy)

example.eg: In the past, Army officers hardly ever mixed socially with the lower ranks.
Talk to that criminal? I wouldn't lower myself.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自贬身份, 贬低你自己

example.eg: Don't lower yourself by responding to his insults.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 屈尊降贵, 自降身份

example.eg: The Duchess lowered herself by marrying a commoner.
Please type in all lowercase.
Use a mixture of capital and lowercase letters in your password.
When using letters for this outline, please make sure to lowercase them.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 用小写字母书写或印刷
